thread.title: Kyle Guy destroys Grayson Allen's ankles with a crossover
thread.title_full: Kyle Guy destroys Grayson Allen's ankles with a crossover

title: Kyle Guy destroys Grayson Allen's ankles with a crossover
text: Kyle Guy destroys Grayson Allen's ankles with a crossover Virginia freshman Kyle Guy had no regard for the life of Grayson Allen's ankles. — Jake Hyman (@RealJakeHyman) February 16, 2017 Virginia freshman Kyle Guy has a feeling for the big moment and one of the sweeter jump shots in college basketball. And so when he came running off a screen, he had Duke star Grayson Allen desperately trying to make up the ground before Guy viciously crossed over Allen before burying a huge three-pointer. In Allen’s defense, his ankles have been bothering him for a few games now, and he had them further wrapped at halftime. But Guy didn’t seem to be too worried about Allen’s ankle health with that crossover. Author
